thread.title: Free Shipping - Expert Traveler Accessories Announces A Special Introductory Offer
thread.title_full: Free Shipping - Expert Traveler Accessories Announces A Special Introductory Offer

author: prbuzz.com
title: Free Shipping - Expert Traveler Accessories Announces A Special Introductory Offer
text:
July 10, 2015 - San Francisco, CA -- A recent survey has shown that most people who purchase a product online, believe that they not only have a wider choice range but there is also a perception that buying Online is cheaper than buying from a Store.
There is a perception that Traditional Retailers have greater overheads, thereby requiring higher margins which are passed on to the end consumer.
Paying additional for shipping is often overlooked by the consumer, who is wrapped up in the purchasing experience.
Shipping Costs can greatly influence the final cost of the item and this can become a shock for the Online Buyer.
To reward their loyal online Customers Expert Traveler Accessories is very pleased to announce Free Shipping on Orders over $35 for a limited time.
"Here is the golden opportunity to obtain a second Digital Luggage Scale to present to family, friends or colleagues and take advantage of the Free shipping bonus." said Rose Ilton, Company Representative
The pocketsize, electronic luggage scale complete with a built-in Overload Luggage sensor and display, 1 meter Measuring Tape,Green LCD Display showing Imperial weight measurements ( lbs) and metric ( kg) up to a capacity of 110 lbs / 50 kg, comes with two AAA batteries for convenience and has an Instruction insert within the stylish packaging.
The device is very easy to hold and compact to be able to store in a jacket pocket or handbag.
"Not only do customers receive this great offer but Expert Traveler Accessories provides a 12 month Warranty on all of their products." said Rose.
Free shipping is available for a limited time with full details available on the Amazon website.
About Expert Traveler Accessories
Expert Traveler Accessories is a leading Global supplier of high quality Travel Accessories including the Newly designed Pocket Scale .
"The company is determined to deliver exceptional service to all valued customers" stated Company Customer Service Manager, Rose Ilton.
